title: Crime Alert .7.03.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert .7.03.19
description:
Justice served as a murderer is caught thanks to DNA. Police release video to help solve 1995 murder. Manson family member granted parole.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
